summary: A woman stands up in an auditorium and passionately addresses a man at a podium, accusing him of defending Palestinians and criticizing his stance on the conflict. She questions his support for Israel and accuses him of funding fascism and apartheid. The man responds calmly, urging against shouting and emphasizing the importance of democracy. The audience watches attentively.
keywords: Germany, Jewish, Woman, yells, defending, Palestinians, money, weapons, killing, blood, hand, shouting, believe, right, follow, divide, us, funding, fascism, apartheid
